[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@codemonger-io/cdk-qwik-bundle](./cdk-qwik-bundle.md) &gt; [BundlingOptions](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.md) &gt; [assetHashType](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.assethashtype.md)

## BundlingOptions.assetHashType property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Asset hash type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly assetHashType?: AssetHashType;
```

## Remarks

You have to specify [AssetHashType.CUSTOM](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.AssetHashType.html#custom) to use [BundlingOptions.assetHash](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.assethash.md)<!-- -->.

The default value is [AssetHashType.SOURCE](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.AssetHashType.html#output)<!-- -->, because reinstalling dependencies on every build is too expensive.
